bibl.title: POxy 2806: A Fragment of Cratinus?
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XXXVII, 2806. "It is the purpose of this paper to reconsider the nature of the fragment, and to propose in so doing that it should indeed be recognized as a fragment of Cratinus, and specifically of the play Dionysalexandros."
bibl.seg: Handley Eric Walter, POxy 2806: A Fragment of Cratinus?

P. Oxy. XXXVII, 2806. "It is the purpose of this paper to reconsider the nature of the fragment, and to propose in so doing that it should indeed be recognized as a fragment of Cratinus, and specifically of the play Dionysalexandros."
